roberta_planks_for_the_past.title: Planks for the Past
roberta_planks_for_the_past.description: Roberta's fishmonger shop is falling apart. She needs help repairing a large hole in the wall.

stages.text: I should speak to Roberta at Tide & Trade to see what's troubling her.
I need to find a way to get 10 Wooden Planks to help Roberta.
I have the planks. I should use them to repair the wall at Tide & Trade.
The wall is fixed. I should talk to Roberta to receive my reward.

rodrick_wolf_pack.title: The Wolf Pack
rodrick_wolf_pack.description: Sergeant Rodrick is concerned about a growing wolf pack that has been attacking travelers on the roads near the woods. He needs someone to deal with the pack's leader, a large, scarred alpha wolf.

stages.text: I should speak to Corporal Matthias at Mosswatch Keep to get directions.
Sergeant Rodrick wants me to talk to the hunter in the woods.
Ronald offered to help hunt the wolves for half the reward. I need to decide.
I need to hunt the wolf pack in the woods.

luke_tutorial.title: Luke’s First Day
luke_tutorial.description: Learn the basics: navigate, talk, choose a perk, share breakfast, meet friends, and end the day.

stages.text: Leave the room and go to Leo’s Lighthouse.
Play with Sarah or Robert, or alone.
End the day and go to sleep.
